'''Arrival Schedule''' is an event item obtained during the World Quest ''[[Festive Elegance]]'' during the [[Hues of the Violet Garden]] event.

==Text==
Two Days Before the Festival<br />
Ship and Guests: large passenger ship, bards from Mondstadt, a guest painter, [[Albedo|Calx]], and [[Klee|his dependent]].<br />
Estimated Arrival Time: 8 AM

Second Day of the Festival<br />
Ship and Guests: large passenger ship, calligraphers and painters from Liyue, Theater Mechanicus players, and a guest writer, [[Xingqiu|Zhenyu]].<br />
Estimated Arrival Time: 10 AM

Third Day of the Festival<br />
Ship and Guests: large cargo ship, stopover, one person.<br />
Estimated Arrival Time: 9 AM

...

The Day Following the Release Event<br />
Ship and Guests: small passenger ship, two persons.<br />
Estimated Arrival Time: 10 AM
